structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS

law.text: The board may adopt such rules and regulations as are necessary to carry out the purposes for which the waste management district was created and necessary for the adequate management of solid waste in a manner adequate to protect the public health and consistent with such rules and regulations as may be promulgated by the department.
law.history: Amended 1982 Ky. Acts ch. 74, sec. 6, effective July 15, 1982. -- Amended 1978 Ky. Acts ch. 115, sec. 11, effective June 17, 1978. -- Created 1966 Ky. Acts ch. 66, sec. 7.
